using pure essential oils is actual the worse thing you could do for your system. The rate of absorption into your blood is very high, plus you increase your risk of phototoxicity and sensitivity. In a fragrance bottle, they are diluted with safety in mind. If you dont want to buy perfume, i would suggest you prepare a diluted concoction of the essential oils in jojoba/coconut, and use that mix as your scented product. Also dont stay in the sun too much or too long
